title: post api v1 auth login should authenticate user with valid credentials
description: Test the /api/v1/auth/login endpoint to ensure it correctly authenticates a user with valid username and password, returning a JWT token and user role.

title: post api v1 auth register should create new user account
description: Verify that the /api/v1/auth/register endpoint successfully registers a new user with valid data and returns appropriate success response.

title: post api v1 auth logout should invalidate user session
description: Ensure that the /api/v1/auth/logout endpoint properly invalidates the current user session and JWT token, requiring authentication.

title: post api v1 cash open should start new cash register session
description: Test the /api/v1/cash/open endpoint to confirm it opens a new cash register session for the authenticated user and returns session details.

title: post api v1 cash close should close active cash session
description: Verify that the /api/v1/cash/close endpoint closes the current active cash session and updates its status accordingly.

title: get api v1 products should list products with filters and pagination
description: Test the /api/v1/products GET endpoint to ensure it returns a paginated list of products with optional filtering parameters.

title: post api v1 products should create new product
description: Verify that the /api/v1/products POST endpoint creates a new product with valid input data and returns the created product details.

title: post api v1 orders should create new order for table or delivery
description: Test the /api/v1/orders POST endpoint to ensure it creates a new order assigned to a table or for delivery/takeaway with correct order details.

title: get api v1 kitchen orders should return active kitchen orders
description: Verify that the /api/v1/kitchen/orders GET endpoint returns a list of active kitchen orders filtered by status if provided.

title: get api v1 reports sales should generate sales report for date range
description: Test the /api/v1/reports/sales GET endpoint to ensure it generates a sales report for a specified date range with correct data.
